Vault.vault-id-info: A unique id of your vault in The Unit
Vault.stability-fee-info: Currently it's free to use vaults in The Unit. Later we may collect the stability fee.
Vault.liquidation-price-info: The Liquidation Price is the price at which a Vault becomes vulnerable to liquidation.
Vault.collateralization-ratio-info: Your collateralization ratio is calculated by: value of your collateral / UNIT debt.
Vault.collateral-locked-info: The total value in dollars of the collateral in your vault
Vault.not-enough-balance: You cannot deposit more collateral than the amount in your wallet
Vault.not-enough-unit: Minimum {num} UNIT need to be minted
Vault.lower-than-ratio: The collateral ratio cannot be lower than the liquidation ratio
Vault.check-connection: Please check your network connection and refresh to try again
Vault.transaction-sent-receipt: Transaction sent! Click to see it in Etherscan.
